name: Pr0jection
description:
A platformer experience. The player can use a tool to trigger “ghosts” visions, that directly shows to them a path, whether it be the way to go, or the way not to go.

The player must face different deadly traps that can be surpassed through the use of the tool, by seeing the ghost's path and gaining information about what should be done.

This game was made over the span of 72 hours for the 63rd Mini Jam.

People who helped make this game.

Lexsteen #6977 https://itch.io/profile/lexsteen - Game Design + Level Design

ItsmeMaxim #8698  https://itch.io/profile/itsmemaxim - Programming + UI Design

Jowy #8408  https://itch.io/profile/jjowy - Art
